scenario_text.value:
Oh, Miu! I’m so glad you’re with Takuma and
Agumon.
Are you okay? You’re not hurt, are you?
Oh jeez, Syako-mono became Syako-stereo?!
She’s just a fake!
She who smelt it, dealt it! You’re the fake!

Takumaaa! How am I supposed to tell them
apart?!
Hmm, let’s see...

(There must be something like the others to
help tell them apart.)
(The real Syakomon would...)
Know Miu’s strong.
Not doubt her feelings.
Not call Miu a loner.
...Do what, I wonder?

The real Syakomon would know how strong you
are, Miu. That’s how you can tell them apart.

Huh, that’s true! Well then, how about
this...
Hey Syakomon, you think I’m a tough kid?
(Uh, that’s a weird question...)
Yeah, you’re a tough kid!
Oh yeah, super tough for sure!
(I thought so.)
Uh, huh? I still don’t get it, Takuma!

This is like one of those exorcism deals,
right, Miu? Pffft.
It’s nothing like that! Sheesh!

Miu’s the type of strong girl who does all
she can, even when things are nuts!
Ah... I think I might get it, now.

The real Syakomon wouldn’t doubt you. Your
feelings should get through to her, Miu!
Oh, yeah! That works!
Okay, Syakomon! You know, I...
I friggin’ love youuu!
Aw yeah! I love you too, Miuuu!
Huh? Where’d that come from, Miu?
...Um? Neither of those seemed off the mark.

Anyway, come with me now! Otherwise I’m gonna
get yelled at by Arukenimon!

I’ll be in trouble if I don’t sacrifice any
human children!

What?! This Syakomon’s giving me the heebie-
jeebies!

The real Syakomon wouldn’t think you’re a
loner. That should help you figure it out.
Oh, uh, you think? Let’s try it...
Hey, Syakomon. You think I’m a loner?

Of course I don’t! You’ve got your brother,
after all!
Yeah, I second that!
Wait, what? Which is it...

Then you’ve got Takuma, Aoi, Agumon, and all
the rest!
You’ve got tons of nice people around you!

That’s not true! They’ll get sick of her and
back off, just like the others!
That’s not true! They’re all good people!
Okay... Yeah, I’ve got it.
Sorry, I really don’t know.
Oh yeah... Well then! Eeny, meeny, miney, mo.
The real Syakomon is...
On the right!
On the left!
Hee hee, what an idiot...
Wha’, what is this! Look at all this gas...
(This is bad. My consciousness is fading...)
This one!
I knew you’d figure it out, Miu! Good job!
Hmph...
Ah, the fake one ran away!

Dammit, we could’ve at least asked her where
Arukenimon is...
Whoa! What’s that sound?!
Someone must be fighting!

I’m gonna go look. Miu, you head that way and
join up with Aoi.
Got it!
Let’s go, Agumon!
Yeah!
